donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr:
Goal: To achieve a strengthened and more effective health delivery system.
Target Group/Beneficiaries:
Health workers, communities and people affected/infected by HIV/AIDS, tuberculosis and malaria.
Strategies:
Provide long-term comprehensive human resource for health plan, distribute HRH equitably and create incentive package to retain key staff, make results-oriented performance as primary basis for improved remuneration, promote the achievement of full performance of health workers, improve M&E system through strengthening HMIS.
Planned Activities:
Provide retention scheme allowances for health workers from F+ to C5 grades ii) Conduct external review of effectiveness and appropriateness of retention scheme at the end of phase iii) Conduct provincial training of human resources manager and assistants iv) Provide allowances to community home based caregivers, community-based health workers and urban health promoters. v) Strengthen the capacity of the HSB and MOHCW sustain the retention scheme through government accounts. vi)Upgrade IT equipment and software in MOHCW. vii) Conduct trainings on IT. data collection and HIMS.viii) Capacity development of sub recipients.
